page.title: 18The Village Pub(2)
page.content: There are some improvements planned for the pub;such as to the kitchen which used to be a stable and to the beer garden which used to be waste land.We now have live music with an organ. My dad has been in the trade for nineteen years.He used to work at the Dock Hotel in Liverpool.Before he started working in pubs and hotels he was a teacher. He taught technology and he worked in the building trade. There are quite a lot of country village pubs round here. Most of them are quite small.There is the Longton Arms just up the road. It is in Walmer Bridge even though it is called the Longton Arms.There is the Smithy Inn in Much Hoole and the Golden Ball and the Dolphin in Longton. (Gary Taylor)
